member.name: T:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider
member.summary: Uses the Microsoft Extensions Logging Abstractions logger to log from the Moonrise logging.

member.name: M:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider.NextLogger
member.summary: The next logger to pass the log message on to. Allows additional loggers to be used. Don't create circular links though eh!

member.name: M:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider.Clone
member.returns: A new instance with the same contents values as itself

member.name: M:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider.FlushBuffers
member.summary: Flush any buffers currently in use.

member.name: M:Moonrise.Logging.DncLogProvider.LogThis(Moonrise.Logging.LoggingLevel,System.String,System.String,Moonrise.Logging.LogTag,System.String)
member.summary: Logs the appropriate level of message.
member.param: The context - if is false, this will be empty.
The thread identifier - if is false, this will be empty.
